name: steamer

steamer noun [C]
(BOAT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a boat or ship that moves by steam power

steamer noun [C]
(CONTAINER)
a container with holes in the bottom that is put over boiling water in order to cook food in steam, or a machine that cooks food with steam: a rice steamer a vegetable steamer
/GettyImages
